Module kivakit.logs.email
Package com.telenav.kivakit.logs.email

Class EmailLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.logging.logs.BaseLog
      • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.logging.logs.text.BaseTextLog
        • com.telenav.kivakit.logs.email.EmailLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filtered<LogEntry>, Closeable, Flushable, Operation, Startable, Stoppable, Named, Log, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public class EmailLog
extends BaseTextLog
    A Log service provider that sends emails. Configuration occurs via the command line. See LogServiceLogger for details. Further details are available in the markdown help. The options available for configuration with this logger are:
    • to - The set of email addresses to send to
    • from - The email address to send from
    • subject - The subject line
    • host - The SMTP host
    • username - The SMTP username
    • password - The SMTP password
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
